languages.text: "Мне приятна твоя компания, Арджента. Я надеюсь, что ты останешься в команде, и этот корабль станет для тебя домом".
"I enjoy your company, Argenta. I hope that you remain in the crew and that this ship becomes your home."
languages.original_text: "Мне приятна твоя компания, Арджента. Я надеюсь, что ты останешься в команде, и этот корабль станет для тебя домом".

traits.locale_text: "I enjoy your company, Argenta. I hope that you stay with the crew and that this ship becomes your home."
"I enjoy your company, Argenta. I hope that you stay with the crew and that this ship becomes your home."
"I enjoy your company, Argenta. I hope that you remain in the crew and that this ship becomes your home."
"I enjoy your company, Argenta. I hope that you remain in the crew and that this ship becomes your home."
"I enjoy your company, Argenta. I hope that you remain in the crew and that this ship becomes your home."

languages.text: “我很喜欢你的陪伴，阿洁塔。我希望你能继续留在这里，把这艘船当成你的家。”
languages.original_text: "I enjoy your company, Argenta. I hope that you remain in the crew and that this ship becomes your home."

traits.locale_text: “我很喜欢你的陪伴，阿洁塔。我希望你能继续留在这里，把这艘船当成你的家。”

languages.text: «Disfruto de su compañía, Argenta. Espero que permanezca en la tripulación y que la nave se convierta en su hogar».
languages.original_text: "I enjoy your company, Argenta. I hope that you remain in the crew and that this ship becomes your home."

traits.locale_text: «Disfruto de su compañía, Argenta. Espero que permanezca en la tripulación y que la nave se convierta en su hogar».

languages.text: 「共にいられて嬉しいよ、アルジェンタ。お前が乗組員となって、この船が家となることを願おう」
languages.original_text: "I enjoy your company, Argenta. I hope that you remain in the crew and that this ship becomes your home."

traits.locale_text: 「共にいられて嬉しいよ、アルジェンタ。お前が乗組員となって、この船が家となることを願おう」

languages.text: "Ich genieße Eure Gesellschaft, Argenta. Ich hoffe, dass Ihr in der Crew bleibt und dass dieses Schiff zu Eurem Zuhause wird."
languages.original_text: "I enjoy your company, Argenta. I hope that you remain in the crew and that this ship becomes your home."

traits.locale_text: "Ich genieße Eure Gesellschaft, Argenta. Ich hoffe, dass Ihr in der Crew bleibt und dass dieses Schiff zu Eurem Zuhause wird."

languages.text: « J'apprécie votre compagnie, Argenta. J'espère que vous resterez dans l'équipage et que ce vaisseau deviendra votre foyer. »
languages.original_text: "I enjoy your company, Argenta. I hope that you remain in the crew and that this ship becomes your home."

traits.locale_text: « J'apprécie votre compagnie, Argenta. J'espère que vous resterez dans l'équipage et que ce vaisseau deviendra votre foyer. »

languages.text: "Argenta, yanımda olman hoş. Umarım mürettebatta kalırsın, bu gemi de evin olur."
languages.original_text: "I enjoy your company, Argenta. I hope that you remain in the crew and that this ship becomes your home."

traits.locale_text: "Argenta, yanımda olman hoş. Umarım mürettebatta kalır ve bu gemiyi ev edinirsin."
